casebody.data:
HART, et al.
v.
STATE, et al. No. 372A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 10, 2014. Robert Thomas Numbers, II, Raleigh, Richard D. Komer, Narendra Ghosh, Chapel Hill, Christine Bischoff, Carlene M. McNulty, for Cynthia Perry and Gennell Curry. Renee Flaherty. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for Hart, et al. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Stephen D. Martin, Raleigh, for Perry, Cynthia, et al. Lauren M. Clemmons, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina, et al. Robert F. Orr, Asheville, Edwin M. Speas, Jr., Carrie Virginia McMillan, Raleigh, for Richardson, et al.

Opinion

Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(a) and (b)(2) and Rule 15(e)(2) of the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure, the Court on its own initiative hereby certifies for review prior to determination in the Court of Appeals Hart, et al. v. State of North Carolina, COAP14-659. The case shall be docketed in this Court as of the date of this order. Briefs of the respective parties that have been submitted to the Court of Appeals shall be considered by this Court. Any party may file a new brief in this Court consistent with the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure.
